fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 slipped 207 points or 1.05% to settle at 19,526.55. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, surged 9.67% to 11.28. Reliance Industries, HDFC Bank and ICICI Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The August 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 31 August 2023.
